mapper.select: SELECT s_num, s_id, s_pw, s_nickname, s_profile_imgurl, s_name, s_resident_num, s_email, s_phone, s_join_date, s_seller_agree, s_content_agree, s_privaty_agree, s_address, s_bank_name, s_account_num, s_ah_name, s_certificate_detail, s_certificate_dataurl, s_career_detail, s_career_dataurl, s_grade s_answer FROM seller_tbl WHERE s_num > 0 ORDER BY s_num DESC
